title: New: Angel Haze – On The Edge
content:
Bitch.

Bitch.Bitch. Jesus, it’s only the 3rd of January, my body chemistry is still all over the fucking place and the last thing I want to hear is two MC’s squabbling. For the record, I’m with Angel Haze, but only because Azealia Banks hasn’t responded yet. In conclusion, I couldn’t give less of a fuck. Apparently a twitter war is going on as we speak. AS WE SPEAK??? What the hell are you doing on CitR, go and check it out immediately.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
